Name: MPI_Cart_coords
Description: MPI_Cart_coords gets the coordinate of a process in a communicator that has a cartesian topology.

Parameters.Name: rank
Parameters.Description: The rank of the process to locate in that communicator.

Parameters.Name: dimension_number
Parameters.Description: The number of dimensions of the cartesian topology.

Parameters.Name: coords
Parameters.Description: An array in which store the coordinates of the process in the cartesian topology of the communicator passed.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the coordinates fetch.

  • MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.
